C6H7NaO6P2

150(2)

Wavelength (Å)

0.71073

Crystal system

Triclinic

Space group

0.30 × 0.25 × 0.20

Table 1. Crystal data and structure refinement for Na[H<sub>3</sub>bdp]

| Empirical formula | C<sub>6</sub>H<sub>7</sub>NaO<sub>6</sub>P<sub>2</sub> |
|-------------------|--------------------------------------------------|
| Formula weight    | 260.05                                           |
| Temperature (K)   | 150(2)                                           |
| Wavelength (Å)    | 0.71073                                          |
| Crystal system    | Triclinic                                        |
| Space group       | P<alternatives>$$ \bar{1} $$</alternatives>       |
| a (Å)             | 5.7500(3)                                        |
| b (Å)             | 7.9180(5)                                        |
| c (Å)             | 10.4420(6)                                       |
| α (°)             | 80.398(3)                                        |
| β (°)             | 76.844(4)                                        |
| γ (°)             | 81.389(4)                                        |
| Volume (Å<sup>3</sup>) | 453.34(5)                                      |
| Z                 | 2                                                |
| Density (calculated) | 1.905 g cm<sup>−3</sup>                          |
| Absorption coefficient (mm<sup>−1</sup>) | 0.531           |
| Absorption correction | Multi-scan                                    |
| F(000)            | 264                                              |
| Crystal size (mm) | 0.30 × 0.25 × 0.20                                |
| Theta range for data collection (°) | 3.53–27.55       |
| Index ranges      | −7 ≤ h ≤ 7; −10 ≤ k ≤ 10; −13 ≤ l ≤ 13             |
| Reflections collected | 5552                                      |
| Independent reflections | 2011 [R(int) = 0.0798]                     |
| Reflections observed (>2σ) | 1275                                 |
| Data Completeness | 0.958                                          |
| Absorption correction | Semi-empirical from equivalents              |
| Max. and min. transmission | 0.905 and 0.814                          |
| Refinement method | Full-matrix least-squares on F<sup>2</sup>       |
| Data/restraints/parameters | 2011/2/143                                |
| Goodness-of-fit on F<sup>2</sup> | 1.093                                |
| Final R indices [I > 2σ(I)] | R<sub>1</sub> = 0.0658 wR<sub>2</sub> = 0.1445 |
| R indices (all data) | R<sub>1</sub> = 0.1225 wR<sub>2</sub> = 0.1692   |
| Largest diff. peak and hole (e Å<sup>−3</sup>) | 0.676 and −0.647 |
